data.prayer: Father, your Word can be a lamp to the feet of the 829,397 people in the state of Táchira who claim to know you, if they open it and read it today.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Táchira, Venezuela
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Táchira, Venezuela to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the state of Táchira. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.prayer: Please, teach the 143,141 believers in Táchira, Venezuela how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Turk people.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Táchira, Venezuela to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Father, help the 143,141 believers in Táchira to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.section_summary:
the state of Táchira, Venezuela has a population of 1,177,300.

We estimate Táchira has 143,141 people who might know Jesus, 829,397 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 204,762 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 8 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Táchira, Venezuela.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.
